sense.gloss: point worthy of note, good point, part worth seeing, highlight, good scene
(signs of) promise, good prospects (for the future)

sdata.j: ↑京都↑↓きょうと↓にはたくさんの↑見所↑↓|みどころ|↓がある。
sdata.e: There are a lot of sights in Kyoto.

sdata.j: このあたりは↑見↑↓|み↓どころ|がいっぱいです。
sdata.e: There are a lot of places to see around here.

sdata.j: ↑京都↑↓きょうと↓にはたくさんの↑見所↑↓|みどころ|↓がある。
sdata.e: There are many sights to see in Kyoto.

sdata.j: ↑忙↑↓いそが↓しすぎて、↑君↑↓き|み↓どころ|じゃないよ。
sdata.e: I'm excessively busy and don't have time for you.

sdata.j: ↑忙↑↓いそが↓しすぎて、↑君↑↓き|み↓どころ|じゃないよ。
sdata.e: I'm very busy and don't have time for you.

sdata.j: ↑忙↑↓いそが↓しすぎて、↑君↑↓き|み↓どころ|じゃないよ。
sdata.e: I'm extremely busy and don't have time for you.

sdata.j: この↑映画↑↓えいが↓、↑見↑↓|み↓どころ|↑満載↑↓まんさい↓だなぁ。
sdata.e: This movie is more than well worth watching.

sdata.j: ツッコ|ミどころ|↑多↑↓おお↓すぎてとまどう。
sdata.e: There are so many things that are off with that that I don't even know which to point out first.
